sentences.sContent: He was accused of causing death by reckless driving .
sentences.sCn: 他被控因鲁莽驾驶致人死亡。

sentences.sContent: He ran into the burning house with reckless abandon (= without caring about the danger ) .
sentences.sCn: 他不顾危险冲入着火的房子里。

sentences.sContent: ...Extreme weather and reckless development arc plotting against the rain forest in ways that scientists have never seen...
...They listen to the videos as students from other cities share their stories of how their reckless driving affected not only their lives but also those of their passengers...

synos.tran: 鲁莽的，不顾后果的；粗心大意的

remMethod.val: reck(顾忌， 介意) ＋ less → 无所顾忌的 → 鲁莽的

words.tran: 鲁莽；轻率；不顾一切，不顾后果

trans.tranCn: 鲁莽的， 不考虑后果的
